timeline.message: Add unit test for extracting query metrics
Back to [1m] for increase, inadvertently changed to [5m]

timeline.bodyText: Please add a human readable comment describing the intent
timeline.author: madrob
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,128 @@

+package org.apache.solr.prometheus.exporter;
+
+import java.util.Objects;
+import java.util.Optional;
+import java.util.regex.Matcher;
+import java.util.regex.Pattern;
+
+public class MetricsQueryTemplate {
+  private static final Pattern matchJqTemplate =
+      Pattern.compile("^\\$jq:(?<TEMPLATE>.*?)\\(\\s?(?<UNIQUE>[^,]*),\\s?(?<KEYSELECTOR>[^,]*)(,\\s?(?<METRIC>[^,]*)\\s?)?(,\\s?(?<TYPE>[^,]*)\\s?)?\\)$");

timeline.bodyText: Noble just spent a bunch of effort getting rid of XPath in other places, is this a good direction to be going now?
timeline.author: madrob

replies.bodyText: The code is already using XPath, I'm not introducing it here?
replies.author: thelabdude

replies.bodyText: Also, this happens once during initialization of the Prom exporter, so efficiency of XPath isn't so much of a concern. A few extra millis (if that much) during init doesn't seem like a problem to me, esp. if it makes the code cleaner.
replies.author: thelabdude

timeline.bodyText: Did we need a null check first?
timeline.author: madrob
madrob

timeline.bodyText: Is this going to be slooooooow?
timeline.author: madrob

timeline.bodyText: Check for name.trim.isEmpty also? Isn't there a StringUtils method that does this for us safely?
timeline.author: madrob

timeline.bodyText: Are we trying to be too helpful here? Or is this matching some existing spec?
timeline.author: madrob

replies.bodyText: just trying to be helpful to keep the template syntax simpler ... e.g. I like {{count}} vs. {{$object.value.count}}
replies.author: thelabdude

timeline.author: madrob
madrob

timeline.message: Fix broken test and remove unused getters
Update the key selectors for core-query template to be more clear and add a panel showing number of leaders per node
Update test to reflect changes to templates
Remove auto-decoration around the KEYSELECTOR clause

timeline.bodyText: NULL_DEREFERENCE:  object returned by matched.group("UNIQUE") could be null and is dereferenced at line 88.
timeline.author: sonatype-lift
